external_references.description: Hawley, S. et al. (2023, February 2). Turla: A Galaxy of Opportunity. Retrieved May 15, 2023.

description: During [C0026](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0026), the threat actors re-registered a ClouDNS dynamic DNS subdomain which was previously used by [ANDROMEDA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1074).(Citation: Mandiant Suspected Turla Campaign February 2023)
